tool_description: Provide a domain to discover CORS misconfigurations vulnerabilities of websites. This API helps website administrators and penetration testers to check whether the domains and  URLs they are targeting have insecure CORS policies.
name: CORS Scan
title: CORS Scan

api_list.name: CORS Scan
api_list.description: Enter a domain to  discover CORS misconfigurations vulnerabilities of provided websites

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Enter a domain here to discover CORS misconfigurations vulnerabilities of websites
